1.content:
sarah was looking in her mirror she didnt like what she saw witch was fat she thought some of the extra baby weight would be gone by now it has been two weeks cents she gave birth she never had issues losing weight befor but knew having a baby changes your body and befor she was doing buffy with all the stunts on buffy & going to the gym in her free time help keep the weight off back then but now she didnt seem to lose a pound no matter how hard she tryed but some times looks wornt what they seem so she layed out a few pairs of pants and she was gonna try them all on she had a pair of her old size 2 pants a size 4 and her new size for now 7 she tryed the 2s on but they wouldnt go pass her new bubble butt she took them off and tryed the size 4s they got passed her ass but didnt button or zip her belly got in the way she put on then hated 7s they fit but even they felt a bit thight she hoped something happend in the wash and she wasnt putting on even more weight she tryed to work out but with the baby it was hard all sarah seemed to do was take care of baby eat & sleep freddie would help if he wasnt working on the tv show 24 he was a wonderful dad but he wasnt home very much sarah grabed a plan black shirt took one last look in the mirror just as she was about to leave the room she saw someone else in the mirror it was freddie he wrapped his long arms around her started kissing her neck she pushed him away & looked up at him

sarah: no dont freddie i feel icky

freddie smiled
freddie: your crazy you look fine
sarah: your the crazy one i'm a cow

sarah: your right its normal but i wish i could lose the weight now do you really think i'm cute like this

what does freddie think

113.content:
Four days later

sarah Stood on the scale in her bra and panties she know she had gained even more weight in the last four days.
Her belly was becoming less toned and softer her pants were getting tighter her hips wider her butt rounder.
Sarah looked at the scale it read 130 wow five pounds in four days thought Sarah.
Sarah walked in her room feeling a bit upset about the gain.
Sarah started getting dressed for the day she put on her small shirt it was tight around her boobs and road up showing her less toned belly.
Next Sarah put on her pants they went past her wider hips even past her rounder ass but they just wouldn't close she sucked in her belly but it was no use. Sarah gave up on those pants and grabbed some sweats.
It's time for new clothes thought Sarah
113.title: in the past 4 days

ok this is set after Sarah has her baby so she still has a little extra baby weight already Freddie is just normal no fast weight gain it has to be a day by day kinda thing there can be more then one day per chapter at Sarah cant go over 200 pounds Freddie cant go over 400 pounds they have to like each others gain but no one else has to like it keep the sex to a TV 14 rating and just to help out a bit lets say before Sarah got pregnant she weighed 100 pounds and a size 2 and now after the birth she weighs 125 & a size 7 points added depending on how much i like it
